classes.description_en: Optic disc (optic nerve head) - essential landmark for anatomical orientation
classes.description_es: Disco óptico (cabeza del nervio óptico) - marca anatómica esencial para orientación

classes.description_en: Lipid deposits indicating vascular leakage and blood-retinal barrier breakdown
classes.description_es: Depósitos lipídicos que indican fuga vascular y ruptura de barrera hematorretiniana

classes.description_en: Central area of the macula responsible for sharp central vision
classes.description_es: Área central de la mácula responsable de la visión central nítida

classes.description_en: Bleeding in the retina (dot, blot, or flame-shaped hemorrhages)
classes.description_es: Sangrado en la retina (hemorragias en forma de punto, mancha o llama)

classes.description_en: Soft exudates caused by ischemia and nerve fiber layer infarction
classes.description_es: Exudados blandos causados por isquemia e infarto de capa de fibras nerviosas

classes.description_en: Small punctate hemorrhages, often confused with microaneurysms. Appear as tiny red dots.
classes.description_es: Pequeñas hemorragias puntiformes, a menudo confundidas con microaneurismas. Aparecen como puntos rojos diminutos.

classes.description_en: Fluid accumulation in the macula causing retinal thickening
classes.description_es: Acumulación de líquido en la mácula causando engrosamiento retiniano

classes.description_en: Small dilations of retinal capillaries - earliest clinical sign of diabetic retinopathy
classes.description_es: Pequeñas dilataciones de los capilares retinianos - signo clínico más temprano de retinopatía diabética

classes.description_en: Abnormal new blood vessel growth - hallmark of proliferative diabetic retinopathy
classes.description_es: Crecimiento anormal de nuevos vasos sanguíneos - característica de retinopatía diabética proliferativa

classes.description_en: Irregular caliber of retinal veins - sign of severe ischemia
classes.description_es: Calibre irregular de las venas retinianas - signo de isquemia severa

classes.description_en: Intraretinal microvascular abnormalities - dilated capillaries or shunt vessels
classes.description_es: Anomalías microvasculares intrarretinianas - capilares dilatados o vasos de derivación

known_issues: Microhemorrhages: objects too small for current 640x640 input resolution
Edema: extremely low support in validation set (class imbalance)
Training convergence: loss curves suggest benefit from extended training beyond 100 epochs
recommended_improvements: Address class imbalance through data collection or oversampling
Verify class label mappings for microhemorrhages

usage_notes.normalization: Use technical_name as the canonical reference. Aliases provided for backward compatibility and user input flexibility.
usage_notes.classification: Classes with currently_detected: false are included for future model versions and clinical guideline compatibility.
usage_notes.severity_impact: Used by clinical guidelines to determine diabetic retinopathy severity levels.
usage_notes.categories: anatomical_landmark classes are used for spatial analysis and quadrant detection, lesion classes for clinical classification.
